name: guzzler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also gas guzzler) a car, truck, etc. that uses large amounts of petrol very quickly: This car's a real gas guzzler. As more SUVs and other guzzlers have been added to the roads, oil demand has continued to grow. See
guzzle
More examplesFewer examplesSport utility vehicles are notorious gas guzzlers.His plan would make fuel-efficient vehicles cheaper than guzzlers.Hybrid cars are seen as a green-friendly alternative to gas guzzlers.
